1.text: You read Bane's manifesto and take {{dmg}}[psychic] damage.

2.text: You read a treatise on metaepistemology and while satisfying you are exhausted.

3.text: You find a recipe for a cake and feel hungry.

20.text: You find a scroll hidden between the pages of a book.

default.text: You just can't figure out which spell it is.

2.text: It's a scroll of cure wounds.

shop.text: You look around, but you can't find anything worthwhile.

steal.text: You are caught in the act. You have to pay for bail.

worship.text: You're not sure your prayers are answered or if anyone is even listening.

relax.text: You lay around doing nothing and accomplish nothing.

hunt.text: You catch a coney. At least you have something to cook.

fish.text: You catch a bass. At least you have something to cook.

work.text: You do an adequate job and make {wage} silver pieces

perform.text: Your performance draws a small crowd and earn {3d4} silver pieces.
